Text: "Party Like a Russian" is a song by British singer-songwriter Robbie Williams, released as the lead single from his eleventh studio album "The Heavy Entertainment Show" (2016).

Text: Party Like a Russian:  The single was released in the United Kingdom on 30 September 2016.
